scripts.publish:sdk-alpha: pnpm run build && pnpm -r --filter "./packages/**" --filter "!create-vatts-app" publish publish --no-git-checks --access=public --tag=alpha
scripts.version:sync: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const v=require('./package.json').version; ['packages/vatts','packages/auth','examples/basic-app'].forEach(p=>{const f=`${p}/package.json`; if(fs.existsSync(f)){const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f)); j.version=v; fs.writeFileSync(f, JSON.stringify(j,null,2)+'\n')}})"
scripts.publish:create-app: pnpm run build && pnpm publish --filter create-vatts-app --no-git-checks --access=public
